Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. . You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. . You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the view.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@]+[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the view.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@,]+[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@,]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Template.description: The template of the view as JSON.
Template.markdownDescription:
The template of the view as JSON.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

Actions.description: The actions of the view in an array.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@]+[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Actions.markdownDescription:
The actions of the view in an array.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
One or more tags.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ViewArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the view.
ViewArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the view.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/view/[-:$a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ViewId.description: The view id of the view.
ViewId.markdownDescription:
The view id of the view.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\_\-:\/$]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ViewContentSha256.markdownDescription:
The view content hash.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{64}$  
Update requires: No interruption
